When a young boy mails his Christmas wish list to Santa with one crucial spelling error, a devilish Jack Black arrives to wreak havoc on the holidays.
A pregnant and very poor woman has no place to give birth, and turns to a society lady for help.

A theatre troupe from Punjab visit London to put on a show, where their host falls in love with an actor's family member.
